lo.rx_packet: /sbin/ifconfig lo | grep 'RX packet' | cut -d: -f2 | awk '{ print $1}'
lo.sub: /sbin/ifconfig lo | grep 'inet addr:' | cut -d: -f4 | awk '{ print $1}'
lo.rx_bytes: /sbin/ifconfig lo | grep 'RX bytes' | cut -d: -f2 | awk '{ print $1$2$3}'
lo.tx_bytes: /sbin/ifconfig lo | grep 'TX bytes' | cut -d: -f2 | awk '{ print $1$2$3}'
lo.ip: /sbin/ifconfig lo | grep 'inet addr:' | cut -d: -f2 | awk '{ print $1}'
lo.bcast: /sbin/ifconfig lo | grep 'inet addr:' | cut -d: -f3 | awk '{ print $1}'
lo.tx_packet: /sbin/ifconfig lo | grep 'TX packet' | cut -d: -f2 | awk '{ print $1}'
